column1: Funeral services will be held at 10:00 AM Tuesday
column2: June 23rd in the Antioch Baptist Church. Reverend Jim Faircloth and Reverend David Clark will officiate. Interment will be in the family plot in the Antioch Cemetery. Visitation will be from 6-8 PM Monday
column3: June 22nd in the funeral home.Pallbearers will be George Gibbs
